Uses of Interface
org.displaytag.decorator.DisplaytagColumnDecorator

Packages that use DisplaytagColumnDecorator
org.displaytag.decorator

Uses of DisplaytagColumnDecorator in org.displaytag.decorator
 

Classes in org.displaytag.decorator that implement DisplaytagColumnDecorator
 class AutolinkColumnDecorator
          This takes the string that is passed in, and "auto-links" it, it turns email addresses into hyperlinks, and also turns things that looks like URLs into hyperlinks as well.
 class EscapeXmlColumnDecorator
          This takes the string that is passed in, and escapes html tags and entities.
 class MessageFormatColumnDecorator
          A decorator that simply formats input Objects using a java.text.messageFormat.
 

Fields in org.displaytag.decorator declared as DisplaytagColumnDecorator
static DisplaytagColumnDecorator AutolinkColumnDecorator.INSTANCE
          Instance used for the "autolink" tag attribute.
static DisplaytagColumnDecorator EscapeXmlColumnDecorator.INSTANCE
          Instance used for the "escapeXml" tag attribute.
 

Methods in org.displaytag.decorator that return DisplaytagColumnDecorator
 DisplaytagColumnDecorator DefaultDecoratorFactory.loadColumnDecorator(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext, java.lang.String decoratorName)
           If the user has specified a column decorator, then this method takes care of creating the decorator (and checking to make sure it is a subclass of the DisplaytagColumnDecorator object).
 DisplaytagColumnDecorator DecoratorFactory.loadColumnDecorator(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext, java.lang.String decoratorName)
           Given a column decorator name, returns a org.displaytag.decorator.DisplaytagColumnDecorator instance.
 

Uses of DisplaytagColumnDecorator in org.displaytag.model
 

Methods in org.displaytag.model that return DisplaytagColumnDecorator
 DisplaytagColumnDecorator[] HeaderCell.getColumnDecorators()
          Returns the columnDecorator object for this column.
 

Methods in org.displaytag.model with parameters of type DisplaytagColumnDecorator
 void HeaderCell.setColumnDecorators(DisplaytagColumnDecorator[] decorator)
          Sets the columnDecorator object for this column.
